game.name: THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD: Remake

game.shortDescription: THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD: Remake is a remade version of the game introduced in 1997 in arcade platform. A classic arcade rail-shooter receives a whole new entourage and gameplay changes to suit modern gaming standards.

reviewHighlights.text: The House of the Dead: Remake is a simple and fun arcade shooter with lots of cheesy zombie action. The graphics are nicer, but the silly voice acting...
Beat it so fast I refunded it. Great classic game. I miss this game being in the arcades. Life was great growing up in the 90s
